      • factorial

        public java.lang.Integer factorial​(java.lang.Integer number)
        Given a number, return the factorial of that number. For example, given 5, the factorial is 5 x 4 x 3 x 2 x 1 which should return 120.
        Parameters:
        number -
        Returns:
        the factorial of the number

      • acronym

        public java.lang.String acronym​(java.lang.String phrase)
        Given a phrase, get the acronym of that phrase. Acronym is the combination of the first character of each word in upper case. For example, given "Ruby on Rails", this method will return "ROR"
        Parameters:
        phrase -
        Returns:
        Upper case string of the first letter of each word

      • encrypt

        public java.lang.String encrypt​(java.lang.String word)
        To prevent anyone from reading our messages, we can encrypt it so it will only be readable by its intended audience. This method encrypt the message by shifting the letter by 3 characters. If the character is at the end of the alphabet, it will wraps around. For example: 'a' => 'd' 'w' => 'z' 'x' => 'a' 'y' => 'b'
        Parameters:
        word -
        Returns:
        the encrypted string by shifting each character by three character
